response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for us and is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its worth to us, I propose an offer that reflects its true value while considering your expectations. For this exceptional product, I am offering it to you at $12,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows you to acquire a high-quality item that is worth $8,000 to you. I believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
